ctu_text: in/DOCUMENTS/Order_new/GOs/25915. pdf"}], "schemeImageUrl": "", "detailedDescription_md": "The scheme \u201cVidyajyothi Scheme- Financial Aid for Uniforms and Study Materials to PH Students\u201d was launched by the Department of Social Justice, Government of Kerala. Social Justice Department with the help of Kerala Social Security Mission conducted a State-wide disability survey and it has been identified that there are 7,79,793 differently-abled persons out of which 1,30,799 persons are below the age of 18 years. For the educational upliftment of such PH students, Social Justice Department has initiated this scheme which provides financial assistance for the purchase of uniforms and study materials.
